record.id: field.name="affected.services" and file.name="probsummary" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: affected.services
record.file.name: probsummary

brief.brief: List of the Affected Services for the incident record. When a Configuration Item for the incident is added or updated, a schedule record is created that runs a routine to update the list of affected services.

detail.detail: This tab provides a read-only list of the Affected Services for the incident record. When a Configuration Item for the incident is added or updated, a schedule record is created that runs a routine to update the list of affected services. If the incident record is locked, the routine reschedules the schedule record for five minutes later. You can also perform a Find action from this table to get to the CI record for the service.
